title: Jerk chicken and flatbreads
description: A simple hot and spicy marinade transforms humble chicken thighs into this Jamaican signature dish. Served in warm flatbreads, it will bring sunshine to your plate on the cloudiest of days.
ingredients: 8 boneless chicken thighs, skin on (if possible)
2 tbsp palm sugar or soft light brown sugar
3 tbsp vegetable oil, or enough to make a smooth paste
salt and freshly ground black pepper
300g/10½oz plain flour, plus extra for dusting
